name: Pyramideka
description:
My submission to our own 42Jam!

My goal during the jam was to push the project's aesthetics and build a light narrative. The gameplay is hence fairly basic and there are currently no real objectives so just have fun killing everything or hide away to relax.

Controls

  • WASD - Move around
  • Space - Jump
  • tab - dash
  • E - Use Ability
  • I - Slash Attack
  • C - Put on the mask
    Features controller support
